mapper.sql: goods_id, user_id, goods_name, goods_old_price, goods_new_price, goods_fresh, goods_num, goods_user_phone, goods_user_name, goods_pics, goods_type, goods_time, goods_state, goods_view_num
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
select * from goods ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 6
select * from goods ORDER BY goods.goods_view_num DESC LIMIT 0,8
select * from goods ORDER BY goods.goods_view_num DESC
select * from goods where goods.goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY goods.goods_id DESC LIMIT 0,8
select * from goods where goods.goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY goods.goods_id DESC
select * from goods where goods.goods_name like '%${goodsName}%' ORDER BY goods.goods_id DESC
mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_id, user_id, goods_name, goods_old_price, goods_new_price, goods_fresh, goods_num, goods_user_phone, goods_user_name, goods_pics, goods_type, goods_time, goods_state, goods_view_num) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsOldPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsNewPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsFresh,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPics,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodsState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{goodsViewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER})

user_id,
goods_name,

goods_num,

goods_view_num,

mapper.update:
update goods
goods_id = #{record.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_name = #{record.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_old_price = #{record.goodsOldPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_new_price = #{record.goodsNewPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_fresh = #{record.goodsFresh,jdbcType=TINYINT},
goods_num = #{record.goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_user_phone = #{record.goodsUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_user_name = #{record.goodsUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_pics = #{record.goodsPics,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_type = #{record.goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_time = #{record.goodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
goods_state = #{record.goodsState,jdbcType=CHAR},
goods_view_num = #{record.goodsViewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update goods set goods_id = #{record.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_name = #{record.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_old_price = #{record.goodsOldPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_new_price = #{record.goodsNewPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_fresh = #{record.goodsFresh,jdbcType=TINYINT}, goods_num = #{record.goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_user_phone = #{record.goodsUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_user_name = #{record.goodsUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_pics = #{record.goodsPics,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type = #{record.goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_time = #{record.goodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goods_state = #{record.goodsState,jdbcType=CHAR}, goods_view_num = #{record.goodsViewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_old_price = #{goodsOldPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_new_price = #{goodsNewPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_fresh = #{goodsFresh,jdbcType=TINYINT},
goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_user_phone = #{goodsUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_user_name = #{goodsUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_pics = #{goodsPics,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_time = #{goodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
goods_state = #{goodsState,jdbcType=CHAR},
goods_view_num = #{goodsViewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_old_price = #{goodsOldPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_new_price = #{goodsNewPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_fresh = #{goodsFresh,jdbcType=TINYINT}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_user_phone = #{goodsUserPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_user_name = #{goodsUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_pics = #{goodsPics,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_time = #{goodsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, goods_state = #{goodsState,jdbcType=CHAR}, goods_view_num = #{goodsViewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
